groups.name: spring.python.executor.jep
groups.description: Configuration properties for the JEP-based Python executor integration.

groups.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library
groups.description: Configuration properties for the JEP library management.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.enabled
properties.description: Whether the JEP (Java Embedded Python) executor autoconfiguration is enabled.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.interpreter-type
properties.description: The type of JEP interpreter to use.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.enabled
properties.description: Whether the automatic JEP library management is enabled.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.install.name
properties.description: The name of the JEP Python library to install via pip.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.install.options
properties.description: Additional pip installation options used when installing JEP.

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.install.no-cache-dir
properties.description: Whether to disable pip caching when installing JEP (`--no-cache-dir`).

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.install.no-build-isolation
properties.description: Whether to disable pip build isolation when installing JEP (`--no-build-isolation`).

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.install.python-executable-path
properties.description: Absolute path to the Python dynamic library (e.g., python314.dll or libpython3.11.so).

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.install.jep-executable-path
properties.description: Absolute path to the compiled JEP shared library (e.g., jep.dll or libjep.so).

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.uninstall.name
properties.description: The name of the Python package to uninstall using pip (typically 'jep').

properties.name: spring.python.executor.jep.library.uninstall.options
properties.description: Additional pip options to use when uninstalling the JEP library.
